> > > > > > > > > As the Predacon base rose to the surface Myrmidon

> > > > > stepped 
> > > > > > > onto

> > > > With 
> > > > > the
> > > > > > > > > slightest application of power, bosters flared and 
he 
> > > rose 
> > > > > > above 
> > > > > > > the
> > > > > > > > > muck. 
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > He watched as Trelos ran at the new robot and 
watched 
> > the 
> > > > > > result, 
> > > > > > > a
> > > > > > > > > slight smile flitting across his face. With a flick 
> of 
> > > > > thought 
> > > > > > he 
> > > > > > > > began
> > > > > > > > > transmitting what he saw to the command center, as 
he 
> > > began 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > > > approach
> > > > > > > > > Malice. (OOC: Yes, Hydras should be able to see 
> what's 
> > > > going 
> > > > > on)
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > "Who are you to invade our space with threats of 
> > death?" 
> > > > His 
> > > > > > > voice 
> > > > > > > > is
> > > > > > > > > deep, a cross between a purr and a growl. 
> > Shouldermounted 
> > > > > motar 
> > > > > > > > cannons
> > > > > > > > > turned to orient on the necommer as he 
continued, "It 
> > is 
> > > > you 
> > > > > > who 
> > > > > > > > will
> > > > > > > > > stand down, and you will do it *now*"
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > Preston
> > > > > > > > > (Myrmidon)
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > > >

> > > to 
> > > > > > stable

the 
> > > > > fortress 
> > > > > > > > settled
> > > > > > > > > > and a sentry exited to search- for himself he 
> > assumed, 
> > > he 
> > > > > > > decided 
> > > > > > > > to
> > > > > > > > > > get the creature's attention. He leveled his 
rifle 
> > and 
> > > > > fired a
> > > > > > > > > > careful shot in the beast's path only fet in 
front 
> of 
> > > > him, 
> > > > > > then

paws 
> up

> > > > > won't
